clinical_study.brief_title: Performance of Somofilcon A Over One Week in Wearers Adapted to Omafilcon A
clinical_study.official_title: Performance of Somofilcon A Over One Week in Wearers Adapted to Omafilcon A

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of the study is to determine if habitual or adapted contact lens wearers of Omafilcon A can be confidently refit into Somofilcon A lenses and be successful after one week of daily wear.
The primary outcome variables for this study are:
- Investigator responses to refit questions;
- Lens fit.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective, single-site, dispensing, bilateral wear, open label, daily wear switch study, with the test lens (Somofilcon A) being worn for 7 (+5) days.

primary_outcome.description: Rating ease of refitting participants from Omafilcon A to Somofilcon A at Visit 1 on a six-point Likert scale.
Assessment of lens fit (wettability, deposition, decentration, coverage, movement - all graded 0-4, and tightness - graded 0-100%).
Graded on a 0-4 point scale (where 0 = should not be worn, 4=perfect), providing a reason if Grade 2 or less
